template.bb-sql-review-prod-desc: Comprehensive policy where you have total protection and best practices for your databases.
template.bb-sql-review-dev-desc: Basic coverage to defend your databases from common misusage.
template.bb-sql-review-sample-desc: A minimum template with DROP protection and disallow column nullable.

engine-mysql-use-innodb.title: Use Innodb
engine-mysql-use-innodb.description: Require InnoDB as the storage engine for MySQL.

table-require-pk.title: Require primary key
table-require-pk.description: Require the table to have a primary key.

table-no-foreign-key.title: No foreign key
table-no-foreign-key.description: Disallow the foreign key in the table.

table-drop-naming-convention.title: Drop table with naming convention
table-drop-naming-convention.description: Only tables named with specific patterns can be deleted. The requires users to do a rename before dropping the table. The table name must have "_del" suffix by default.

table-comment.title: Comment convention
table-comment.description: Configure whether the table requires comments and the maximum comment length.

naming-table.title: Table naming check
naming-table.description: Enforce the table name format and length limit. Default snake_lower_case with 63 characters.

naming-column.title: Column naming check
naming-column.description: Enforce the column name format and length limit. Default snake_lower_case with 63 characters.

naming-index-uk.title: Unique key naming check
naming-index-uk.description: Enforce the unique key name format and length limit. Default uk_<table_name>_<column_list> or empty within 63 characters.

naming-index-pk.title: Primary key naming check
naming-index-pk.description: Enforce the primary key name format and length limit. Default pk_<table_name>_<column_list> or empty within 63 characters.

naming-index-fk.title: Foreign key naming check
naming-index-fk.description: Enforce the foreign key name format and length limit. Default fk_<referencing_table>_<referencing_column>_<referenced_table>_<referenced_column> or empty within 63 characters.

naming-index-idx.title: Index naming check
naming-index-idx.description: Enforce the index name format and length limit. Default idx_<table_name>_<column_list> or empty within 63 characters.

naming-column-auto-increment.title: Auto-increment column naming check
naming-column-auto-increment.description: Enforce the auto-increment column name format and length limit. Default id within 63 characters.

column-required.title: Required columns
column-required.description: Enforce the required columns in each table.

column-type-disallow-list.title: Type disallow list
column-type-disallow-list.description: Set the disallow list for column type.

column-set-default-for-not-null.title: Set default value for NOT NULL column
column-set-default-for-not-null.description: Require default value for not NULL column.

column-auto-increment-must-unsigned.title: Set unsigned attribute on auto-increment column
column-auto-increment-must-unsigned.description: Auto-increment column must be the UNSIGNED type.

column-comment.title: Comment convention
column-comment.description: Configure whether the column requires comments and the maximum comment length.

column-maximum-character-length.title: Maximum CHAR length
column-maximum-character-length.description: Force to change CHAR to VARCHAR if maximum length is reached.

column-auto-increment-initial-value.title: Auto-increment initial value
column-auto-increment-initial-value.description: Set initial value for auto-increment column.

column-current-time-count-limit.title: Limit the count of current time columns
column-current-time-count-limit.description: Limit the count of NOW(), CURRENT_TIME() and CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() columns.

statement-where-no-leading-wildcard-like.title: Disallow leading wildcard like
statement-where-no-leading-wildcard-like.description: Disallow leading '%' in LIKE, e.g. LIKE foo = '%x' is not allowed.

statement-disallow-commit.title: Disallow commit
statement-disallow-commit.description: Disallow using commit in the issue.

statement-merge-alter-table.title: Merge "ALTER TABLE"
statement-merge-alter-table.description: Disallow using multiply "ALTER TABLE" statement for same table.

statement-insert-must-specify-column.title: "INSERT" statement must specify column
statement-insert-must-specify-column.description: Must specify the column to insert. For example, "INSERT INTO t (id,name) VALUES(...)".

statement-dml-dry-run.title: Dry run DML statements
statement-dml-dry-run.description: Dry run DML statements by EXPLAIN.

statement-disallow-add-column-with-defau.title: Disallow add column with default
statement-disallow-add-column-with-defau.description: The PostgreSQL will lock the table and rewrite the whole table when you adding column with default value. You can separate the adding column, setting default value and backfilling all existing rows.

statement-add-check-not-valid.title: Add CHECK constraints with NOT VALID option
statement-add-check-not-valid.description: Adding CHECK constraints without NOT VALID can cause downtime because it blocks reads and writes. You can manually verify all rows and validate the constraint after creating.

statement-disallow-add-not-null.title: Disallow add NOT NULL constraints to an existing column
statement-disallow-add-not-null.description: It can cause downtime because it blocks reads and writes. You can add CHECK constraints with NOT VALID option to avoid this.

schema-backward-compatibility.title: Backward compatibility
schema-backward-compatibility.description: MySQL and TiDB support checking whether the schema change is backward compatible.

database-drop-empty-database.title: Drop database restriction
database-drop-empty-database.description: Can only drop the database if there's no table in it.

index-type-no-blob.title: Disallow BLOB
index-type-no-blob.description: Disallow using BLOB type column in index.

index-pk-type-limit.title: Primary key type limit
index-pk-type-limit.description: Enforce the primary key type to be INT or BIGINT.

index-key-number-limit.title: Column count limit in index
index-key-number-limit.description: Limit the related row count in a single index.

index-create-concurrently.title: Create indexes concurrently
index-create-concurrently.description: Creating indexes blocks writes (but not reads) on the table until it's done. Use CONCURRENTLY when creates indexes can allow writes to continue.
